title: Ally McBeal
creator: David E. Kelley
storyline: Ally McBeal follows Ally McBeal, a talented but emotionally unstable lawyer working at the eccentric Boston law firm Cage & Fish. The show presents unusual legal cases and Ally’s personal life, particularly her struggles with love and relationships- especially when she reunites with her former love, Billy, who is now married to another woman.

title: Boston Legal
creator: David E. Kelley
storyline: Boston Legal is a spin-off of The Practice that follows the daily operations of the prestigious Boston law firm Crane, Poole & Schmidt, focusing on unusual legal cases and the personal lives of its eccentric lawyers.

title: Damages
creator: Glenn Kessler, Todd A. Kessler, Daniel Zelman
executive_producers: Glenn Kessler, Todd A. Kessler, Daniel Zelman
storyline: The show follows the intense and high-stakes world of litigation through the perspective of Patty Hewes, a ruthless and brilliant attorney, and her ambitious young protégé, Ellen Parsons

title: Franklin & Bash
creator: Bill Chais, Kevin Falls
executive_producers: Bill Chais, Kevin Falls, Jamie Tarses, Matt McGuiness, Jason Ensler
storyline: Franklin & Bash follows two unconventional and charismatic lawyers, Jared Franklin and Peter Bash, who are best friends and skilled attorneys known for their unorthodox tactics in the courtroom.

title: How to Get Away with Murder
creator: Peter Nowalk
executive_producers: Betsy Beers, Peter Nowalk, Shonda Rhimes
storyline: The show follows Annalise Keating, a brilliant and charismatic law professor and defense attorney, who, along with her students, becomes entangled in a series of murder cases that change their lives forever.

title: Suits
creator: Aaron Korsh
executive_producers: David Bartis, Aaron Korsh, Gene Klein, Doug Liman
storyline: Suits follows the story of Harvey Specter, a top New York attorney known for his confidence, charm, and sharp legal mind, and Mike Ross, a brilliant college dropout with a photographic memory who, despite never attending law school, lands a job as Harvey’s associate at the prestigious law firm Pearson Hardman.

title: The Good Wife
creator: Michelle King, Robert king
executive_producers: Michelle King, Robert King, Ridley Scott, David W. Zucker
storyline: Alicia Florrick has been a good wife to her husband, a former state's attorney. After a very humiliating sex and corruption scandal, he is behind bars. She must now provide for her family and returns to work as a litigator in a law firm.

title: The Practice
creator: David E. Kelley
storyline: The show focuses on the personal and professional lives of a group of defense attorneys at the small but determined Boston law firm Donnell, Young, Dole & Frutt, led by Bobby Donnell.
